content.text: 6 large potatoes, cooked, peeled and cubed
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "6 large potatoes, cooked, peeled and cubed" )
( ing-1 "4 hard-cooked eggs, sliced" )
( ing-2 "2 celery ribs, sliced" )
( ing-3 "6 green onions with tops, sliced" )
( ing-4 "6 radishes, sliced" )
( ing-5 "1 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-6 "1/2 teaspoon pepper" )
( ing-7 "3 eggs, beaten" )
( ing-8 "1/4 cup vinegar" )
( ing-9 "1/4 cup sugar" )
( ing-10 "1/2 teaspoon dry mustard" )
( ing-11 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-12 "1 cup mayonnaise or salad dressing" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, combine potatoes, eggs, celery, green onions, radishes, salt and pepper; set aside.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "potatoes"@28:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "eggs"@38:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "celery"@44:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "green onions"@52:64 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "radishes"@66:74 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "salt"@76:80 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "pepper"@85:91 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "set aside"@93:102 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) For dressing, combine eggs, vinegar, sugar, dry mustard and salt in a saucepan.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "combine"@17:24 / AC
		:subtask ( purp-1-0 "For dressing"@3:15 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "eggs"@25:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "vinegar"@31:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "sugar"@40:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "dry mustard"@47:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "salt"@63:67 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a saucepan"@71:81 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Cook and stir"@-1:-1 / AC
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "medium heat"@22:33 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until thickened"@34:49 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Pour over potato mixture; toss to coat.
